trans-unit.source: Represents an export, which is a type that consists of a delay-created exported object and the metadata that describes that object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> class.

Derived types that call this constructor must override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.Definition%2A> property and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.GetExportedValueCore%2A> method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> class with the specified export definition and exported object getter.
An object that describes the contract that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object satisfies.
A method that is called to create the exported object of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>.
This delays the creation of the object until the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.Value"></xref> property is called.
definition is `null`.
-or-
exportedObjectGetter is `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> class with the specified contract name and exported value getter.
The contract name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object.
A method that is called to create the exported object of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>.
This delays the creation of the object until the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.Value"></xref> method is called.
contractName is `null`.
-or-
exportedObjectGetter is `null`.
contractName is an empty string ("").
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> class with the specified contract name, metadata, and exported value getter.
The contract name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object.

The metadata of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object or `null` to set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.Metadata"></xref> property to an empty, read-only <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2"></xref> object.
A method that is called to create the exported object of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>.
This delays the creation of the object until the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.Value"></xref> method is called.
contractName is `null`.
-or-
exportedObjectGetter is `null`.
contractName is an empty string ("").
Gets the definition that describes the contract that the export satisfies.
Overrides of this property should never return `null`.
A definition that describes the contract that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object satisfies.
This property was not overridden by a derived class.
Returns the exported object the export provides.
The exported object the export provides.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.GetExportedValueCore"></xref> method was not overridden by a derived class.
An error occurred during composition.
<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException.Errors"></xref> will contain a collection of errors that occurred.
Gets the metadata for the export.

This property returns the value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition.Metadata%2A> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.Definition%2A> property.
The metadata of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export.Definition"></xref> property was not overridden by a derived class.
Provides the object this export represents.
The object this export represents.
